### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://animepahe.org/play/eed990c1-103f-5824-8559-20accea42cfa/76be85bc8134c75e4ca15c323170b9fb0ee6265ac59e7f87739d4f3e191e1713](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fanimepahe.org%2Fplay%2Feed990c1-103f-5824-8559-20accea42cfa%2F76be85bc8134c75e4ca15c323170b9fb0ee6265ac59e7f87739d4f3e191e1713) ### Comment > Anywhere you touch redirects you to an ad, I've been complaining about this for months and no one on the development team has done anything about it. I’m almost sure the dev team collides with websites and doesn’t do anything about them because they get paid by them. ### Screenshots

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

issue.title: twitter.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Tweets like below on Twitter homepage are missing after enabling "`AdGuard Annoyances`" list on uBlock Origin.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42044258/198838344-73ac514c-c35a-4e28-8a4e-be4ef64137ba.png)

Disabling that list solves the problem.

### Proposed solution

I don't want to remove those tweets. Is there anyway I can disable this rule without disabling the list.

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: twitter.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Tweets like below on Twitter homepage are missing after enabling "`AdGuard Annoyances`" list on uBlock Origin.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42044258/198838344-73ac514c-c35a-4e28-8a4e-be4ef64137ba.png)

Disabling that list solves the problem.

### Proposed solution

I don't want to remove those tweets. Is there anyway I can disable this rule without disabling the list.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
Solved it:
`twitter.com#@#section[aria-labelledby][role="region"] > div[aria-label] > div[style] > div[style^="transform: translate"] article[data-testid="tweet"]:has(> div[class] > div[class] > div[class] a[href^="/i/topics"][dir="auto"])`
